title: Documentation of Polar for MATLAB
text:
Documentation of Polar for MATLAB
A circular statistics toolbox for computing polar metrics. It includes functions for calculating angular and radial metrics.
Reference:  Gallicchio, G. (2025). Polar. GitHub. https://github.com/GermanoGallicchio/Polar/
